name: Prevailing Position
summary: Your willingness to flow from one stance to another lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself.
description: Your willingness to flow from one stance to another lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself. You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.
trigger: You are targeted by an attack or attempt a Reflex saving throw against a damaging effect, and you are in a stance.
